mapper.select: select o.id, o.orderTime, s.end, s.begin, v.name, v.address, v.price from `order` o left join venue_state s on o.venueStateId = s.id left join venue v on s.venueId = v.id where o.userId = #{id}
select v.id from `order` o left join venue_state s on o.venueStateId = s.id left join venue v on s.venueId = v.id where o.id = #{orderId}
